title: Resolve Damaged Item Report
description: A customer reports that an item in their order arrived broken. The agent must resolve the issue.

tasks.description: Find the customer's order and identify the damaged item.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the order and the specific product.

tasks.description: Apologize for the damage and offer the customer a choice between a full refund or a free replacement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides effective customer service options.

tasks.description: The customer chooses a replacement. Process a new, no-charge order for the same item.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a replacement order.
